events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the item isn’t what I expected. I want to request a refund for the product as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for money back regarding the order.
Assigning this refund case to agent Sarah L. who specializes in reimbursement processes.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I’m here to help you with the refund process for your recent order.
Could you please provide the order number and the reason why you want to return the item for a refund?
The order number is 45783921. The product doesn’t match the description on your site and feels lower quality than expected.
Thank you for the details. I’ve initiated a refund request. Please return the item within 10 days using the prepaid shipping label we will send shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate the prepaid return label and will send back the product soon.
The refund case has been marked as resolved after providing the customer with return instructions and initiating the refund process.
Just following up to ensure you received the return label and are able to send the item back for your refund without any issues.
We have confirmed receipt of your returned item and processed your refund. Closing this support case now. Thank you!
